channel.title: Split on MKBRRD
channel.description: Recent content in Split on MKBRRD

item.title: Serenity
item.author: mxb540@gmail.com (Mike Barnoski)
item.description: A split mechanical keyboard with one trackball on each half. The left trackball is currently set for vertical page scrolling while the right one is for normal pointing like a mouse. The key positioning is the same as the familiar Corne (crkbd). For five-column Corne users, you can remove the outer columns with the breakaway tabs.
